headline: 3 Industrials Stocks in the Penalty Box
summary: Even if they go mostly unnoticed, industrial businesses are the backbone of our country. Unfortunately, this role also comes with a demand profile tethered to the ebbs and flows of the broader economy, and the industry is currently lagging as its six-month return of 7.2% has trailed the S&P 500’s 9.5% gain.
